description: Security vulnerability waivers for SaaS Level-1 template

waivers.title: glob CLI: Command injection via -c/--cmd executes matches with shell:true
waivers.reason: Dev dependency only - used by @next/eslint-plugin-next, not exposed in production builds

waivers.title: js-yaml has prototype pollution in merge (<<)
waivers.reason: Dev dependency only - used by ESLint configuration, not in production runtime

notes: All vulnerabilities are in development dependencies only
Production builds do not include these dependencies
Next.js production builds are safe from these vulnerabilities
